lead_paragraph: GILLEN--Brenda Kiaer, beloved mother, grandmother, sister and wife died peacefully on March 15, 2016. Survived by Francis Gillen, sister and brother-in-law, June and Joseph Viverito, her children, Jennifer, Francis, Spencer, Christopher, Amanda and Louisa, their spouses and 13 grandchildren. A celebration of her life will be held in June in Quogue, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations to Alzheimer's Association would be appreciated. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GILLEN, BRENDA KIAER
